attributes.action: Immediately apologise to, reinstate, and listen to Professor David Nutt - government advisor on drugs policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government will immediately issue a full public apology to Professor David Nutt for firing him because he stating his evidence-based personal opinion which happened to contradict current government policy. Further to this, he should then be reinstated and his evidence and advice to government taken seriously and his opinion given the objective consideration it deserves during a full review of the drugs control policies and laws (which have already been repeatedly promised to the public, but not delivered).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
